Original question: Your friend Wonder Woman tells you that her bracelets are made of a metal, Feminum (this is legit, it was in the ‘70s TV show), only found on her home island. Feminum (symbol Fm) has atomic number 120 and atomic mass 285.47. The element has 2 isotopes, 285Fm and XFm. The natural abundance of 285Fm on the island is 77%. What is the other isotope, and what is its natural abundance?
